name: Offroad 2089: Weird Engine Edition
description:
OKAY SO THIS IS A WEIRD ONE.

here's a completely vastly incomplete, vastly simple.... GODOT version of Offroad 2089. haha.

Like, i spent like two days learning godot, used its physics and added a cool camera. and wow, it's basically like my other game. and i thought, hey, why not just release it. so here it is. it's so weird how it's just like, yeah, here's this entirely different engine, i suppose.
